info.title: Tracer Study API
info.description:
API Documentation for Tracer Study and User Survey Management System
Universitas Andalas

This API provides endpoints for:
- Authentication (Admin, Alumni, Manager)
- Survey Management (Create, Update, Delete, Questions, Rules)
- Email Management (Templates, Blast Emails)
- Response Management (Tracer Study, User Survey)
- Academic Management (Faculty, Major)
- User Management (Admin, Alumni, Manager)
- Role & Permission Management
- FAQ Management

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for Admin, Alumni, and Manager

get.description: Check if API is ready

post.description: Login endpoint for admin users. No reCAPTCHA required.
Login endpoint for alumni users. Requires PIN and Google reCAPTCHA v2 token.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid reCAPTCHA token or validation error

post.description: Login endpoint for manager users. Requires PIN and Google reCAPTCHA v2 token.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid reCAPTCHA token or validation error

get.description:
Get paginated list of surveys with filters

**Required Permission:** `survey.read`

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

**Required Permission:** `survey.create`

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

**Required Permission:** `survey.read`

**Required Permission:** `survey.update`

recaptchaToken.description: Google reCAPTCHA v2 token from frontend
Google reCAPTCHA v2 token from frontend

alumniId.description: Only for manager login response - ID of alumni being surveyed

alumniName.description: Only for manager login response - Name of alumni being surveyed

alumniEmail.description: Only for manager login response - Email of alumni being surveyed
